entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending early this afternoon then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind southwest 20 km/h. High plus 1. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Flurries. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Flurries beginning this evening. Blowing snow over exposed areas before morning. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 50 gusting to 70 before morning. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Flurries. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Flurries ending in the afternoon then cloudy. Blowing snow over exposed areas in the morning. Amount 2 to 4 cm except locally 10 cm over higher terrain. Wind northwest 50 km/h gusting to 70 diminishing to 30 gusting to 50 near noon. High minus 4. Wind chill near minus 16. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NDT Tuesday 4 April 2023
